GSP33brsvbh2u:400: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:405: vācayā kevalamārabhyate vikārajātaṃ, na tu tattvato 'sti, yato nāmadheyamātrametat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:406: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:409: tasmādghaṭaśarāvodañcanādīnāṃ tattvaṃ mṛdeva, tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:413: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ, tathā ca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tasmādavastusat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:416: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:417: na caivaṃ vikārajātaṃ, tasya kadācit kathañcit kutracidavasthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:421: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kvacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:422: atha yasya sadasattve dharmau, te ca svakāraṇādhīnajanmatayā kadācideva
GSP33brsvbh2u:423: bhavataḥ, tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:434: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:435: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:436: athaiṣa prasajyapratiṣedho nirucyatāṃ, kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:437: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:440: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:442: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam'ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:443_0: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ'iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ, na punarlokasiddhatvamatra
GSP33brsvbh2u:443_1: vivakṣitam, anyathā teṣāṃ paramāṇvādirna dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:446: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:448: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:450: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:452: idaṃ tāvadatra vaktavyam, mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:453: vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ, āho bhedaḥ, uta bhedābhedāviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:454: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:460: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh2u:462: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:469: na brahmaṇo jīvabhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ, kintu bhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:470: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasahitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata
GSP33brsvbh2u:473: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:475: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:476: sa ca yathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:479: mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata iti na brūte, kintvavasthābhedāśrayo vyavahāro 'vasthāntaraprāptyā
GSP33brsvbh2u:481: naca tāvatāsau mithyājñānanibandhano bhavatyevamatrāpītyata āha-na cāyaṃ vyavahārābhāva iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:483: na khalvetadvākyamavasthāviśeṣaviniyataṃ brahmātmabhāvamāha jīvasya, api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:486: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:494: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:498: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha-mokṣaśāstrasyāpīti
GSP33brsvbh2u:501: bhavet, na khalvalīkāddhūmaketanajñānaṃ samīcīnamityāha-kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:505: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit
GSP33brsvbh2u:518: 'pi jñānanicayo 'satyaḥ, so 'pi hi vṛttirūpaḥ kāryatayā nirodhadharmā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:521: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:523: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:524: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:525: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:526: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena
GSP33brsvbh2u:529: na ca brūmaḥ sarvasyādasatyātsatyasyopajanaḥ, yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:530: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:531: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:532: evamasatyānāmapi niyamo yataḥ kutaścidasatyātsatyaṃ kutaścidasatyaṃ, yathā dīrghatvādervarṇeṣu samāropitatvāviśeṣe 'pyajīnamityato
GSP33brsvbh2u:535: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:538: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na
GSP33brsvbh2u:539: daṃśavedanāmāpnoti, pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati, evaṃ svapnāntike 'pi tadavasthaṃ sarvamityasatyātkāryasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:544: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ, tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi
GSP33brsvbh2u:549: niścinoti, na tu dehamātram, tanmātratve dehavatpratisaṃdhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:556: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo
GSP33brsvbh2u:559: yaccoktamekatvāṃśena jñānamokṣavyavahāraḥ setsyati, nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha-api cāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:564_0: samastapramāṇatatphalatādvyahārānapabādhamānaivodīyate, naitasyāḥ parastātkiñcidanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ cāsti, yadapekṣena, yena
GSP33brsvbh2u:567: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca na
GSP33brsvbh2u:568: prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta, prayojanavattve vā nāntyā syādityata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh2u:570: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:577: mā bhūdekatvanibandhano vyavahāro 'nekatvanibandhanastvasti, tadeva hi sakalāmudvahati lokayātrām, atastatsiddhyarthamanekatvasya kalpanīyaṃ tāttvikatvamityata āha-prākceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:578: vyavahāro hi buddhipūrvakāriṇāṃ buddhyopapadyate, na tvasyāstāttvikatvena,
GSP33brsvbh2u:580: satyaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādāt, anṛtaṃ ca vicārāsahatayānirvācyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:581: antyasyaikātmyajñānasyānapekṣatayā bādhakatvaṃ, anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan
GSP33brsvbh2u:587: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntena hi kathañcitpariṇāma unneyaḥ, naca śakya unnetum,
GSP33brsvbh2u:589: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:590: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na hyekasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:592: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:596: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kūṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:598: bāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:599: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:603: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati-kūṭasthabrahmātmavādina iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:606: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:607: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ, tattvāśrayaṃ tu tadananyatvasūtram, tenāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:611: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:614: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ, nāpi vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhāyibhāvābhāvena dhūmabhedeneti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:625: paṭa iti hi pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante, na tu tadatiriktaḥ paṭaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:628: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante, yathā grāvāṇa ukhādhāraṇamekam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:630: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama,
GSP33brsvbh2u:632: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:636: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat, avāntarakāraṇāni ca tanvādayaḥ sarve 'nirvācyā evetyāha-tathā ca tantuṣviti //15//
GSP33brsvbh2u:640: na kevalaṃ śrutiḥ, upapattiścātra bhavatiyacca yadātmaneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:641: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:644: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta, jāyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:647: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kvacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kvacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:649: sattvaṃ cet kimato yadyevamityata āha-ekaṃ ca punariti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:652: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:666: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:667: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ, sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha-śaktiśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:671: anabhyupagamyamāne casamavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:674: yathā hi sattvāyogādravyaguṇakarmāṇi santi, sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate, tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:677: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:680: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:682: athaitatprasaṅgabhiyā saṃyogavatsamavāyo 'pi pratisaṃbandhimithunaṃ bhidyate cānityaścetyabhyupeyate, tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva
GSP33brsvbh2u:683: jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:685: saṃbandhāvagame hi saṃbandhakalpanābījaṃ na tādātmyāvagamaḥ, tasya nānātvaikāśrayasaṃbandhavirodhāditi
GSP33brsvbh2u:689: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha-nahi bahutvamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:691: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate, samastavyāsaṅgitvāttadrūpasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:692: avayavī tu na svarūpeṇāvayavānvyāpnotiṃ, api tvavayavaśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:693: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi
GSP33brsvbh2u:698: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kvāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti, tathāpyabhyupetyedamuditamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:702: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate, teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena
GSP33brsvbh2u:703: kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha-ghaṭasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:705: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:713: evañca ghaṭo bhavatīti ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate, taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:715: etaduktaṃ bhavati-notpattirnāma kaścidvyāpāraḥ, yenāsiddhasya kathamatra kartṛtvamityanuyujyeta, kintu svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, svasattāsamavāyo vā, sa cāsato 'pyaviruddha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:717: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasyeti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena
GSP33brsvbh2u:720: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:721: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha-yadi vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:722: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:725: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti
GSP33brsvbh2u:727: uktametadyathā bhujaṅgatattvaṃ na rajjorbhidyate, rajjureva hi tat,
GSP33brsvbh2u:728: kālpanikastu bhedaḥ, evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat, anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:741: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19//
GSP33brsvbh2u:745: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:746: naca bhedābhedāvekatra samavetau virodhāt, naca bhedastāttvika ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:749: upahitaṃ cāsya rūpaṃ śārīraḥ, tena mā nāma jīvāḥ paramātmatāmātmano 'nubhūvan, paramātmā tu tānātmano 'bhinnānanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:756: satyamayaṃ paramātmā sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān
GSP33brsvbh2u:757: paśyati, paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:758: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti
GSP33brsvbh2u:764: yadi brahmaviṣarto jagat, hanta sarvasyaiva jīvavacaitanyaprasaṅga ityata
GSP33brsvbh2u:769: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi |
GSP33brsvbh2u:770: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vividhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:774: na cākramātkāraṇāt kāryakramo jujyato, samarthasya kṣepāyogādadvitīyatayā ca kramavattatsahakārisamavadhānāpapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:776: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam, tato hi kāryaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:779: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyedamucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:780: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:782: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:785: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva
GSP33brsvbh2u:789: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram'iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:794: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣaṇānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ, dṛṣṭā hi kulālādayo bāhyamṛdādyapekṣāḥ, cetanaṃ ca brahmeti, tatredamupatiṣṭhate-
GSP33brsvbh2u:799: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:800: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:802: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:806_0: yadyapi śrutiśatādaikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāt pariṇāmo vastuto niṣiddhastathāpi kṣīrādidevatādṛṣṭāntena punastadvāstavatvaprasaṅgaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:806_1: pūrvapakṣopapattyā sarvathāyaṃ pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityapabādhyaśrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi'iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:817: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28//
GSP33brsvbh2u:822: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:823: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:832: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:833: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:835: aśakyaṃ ca sāvayavatvamupetuṃ, tathā satyanantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:837: āpātamātreṇa sāmyamuktam, paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:845_0: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:845_1: śakyaḥ, yathā tu jāgratsṛṣṭerbāhyakaraṇāpekṣāyāstadanapekṣāntarakaraṇamātrasādhyā dṛṣṭā svapne rathādisṛṣṭiraśakyāpahnotum,
GSP33brsvbh2u:845_2: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato
GSP33brsvbh2u:851: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati, kiṃ punaraparimeyānekavidhoccāvacaprapañcajagadvibhramaviracanā mahāprayāsā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:862: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:863: tatastannivṛttau nivarteta, śiṃśāpātvamiva vṛkṣatānivṛttau, na tvetadasti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:865: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām'iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta
GSP33brsvbh2u:867: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:868: na cāsyāṃ cetanasyāpi caitanyamanupayogi, saṃprasāde 'pi bhāvāditi yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:871_1: naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi jagatsarjane pravṛttirnānupapannā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:872: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:875: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:876: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:877: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti
GSP33brsvbh2u:878: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam, api tvanādyavidyānibandhanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:879: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:882: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturiti cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata
GSP33brsvbh2u:884: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:885: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya
GSP33brsvbh2u:888: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brsvbh2u:891: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa, sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā
GSP33brsvbh2u:892: bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate, tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:896: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:901_0: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate'iti śruterīśvara
GSP33brsvbh2u:901_1: eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati, tasmādvaiṣamyadoṣaprasaṅgānneśvaraḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:903: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:905: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:907: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:913_0: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabhedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ, sahasā saṃharato vā na nairdhṛṇyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:913_1: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34 //
GSP33brsvbh2u:921: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet, tathā ca vidhiniṣedhaśāstramanarthakaṃ bhavet pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:927: puṇyāpuṇyapravṛttihetubhūtarāgadveṣanidānaṃ, sa ca rāgādibhiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:930: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:932_0: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ vāsanāḥ karmapravṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni
GSP33brsvbh2u:932_1: pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:935_0: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam'iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇaṃ samudācaradrūparāgādiniṣedhaparaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:939: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:944: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:945: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh2u:950: iha hi pāde svatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante
GSP33brsvbh2u:952: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:955: nahi vedāntavākyāni nirṇetavyānīti nirṇīyante, kintu mokṣamāṇānāṃ tattvajñānotpādanāya
GSP33brsvbh2u:956: yathā ca vedāntavākyebhyo jagadupādānaṃ brahmāvagamyate, evaṃ sāṃkhyādyanumānebhyaḥ pradhānādyacetanaṃ jagadupādānamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:957: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:958: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:961: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati
GSP33brsvbh2u:962: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti
GSP33brsvbh2u:963: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha--vedāntārthanirṇayasya ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:970: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:973: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni
GSP33brsvbh2u:974_0: dṛṣṭāni, yathā ghaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ, tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca
GSP33brsvbh2u:975: tatra jagatkāraṇasya yeyaṃ sukhātmatā tatsattvaṃ, yā duḥkhātmatā tadrajaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:976: yā ca mohātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:978: yathā maitradāreṣu padmāvatyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃprati satvaguṇasamudbhavāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:979: tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, tāḥ pratyasyā rajoguṇasamudbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:980: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ pratyasyāstamoguṇasamudbhavāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:983: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi, pradhīyate nidhīyate 'sminpralayasamaye jagaditi vā pradhānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:984: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate, na tu kenacitpravartyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:985: tathā hyāhuḥ---'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:990: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitaṃ cetanena pravartate svabhāvata eveti sādhyate, tadayuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:993: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:994: viruddham, evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam
GSP33brsvbh2u:995: yaducyeta dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyacetanaṃ tāvadupādānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tatra yadyapi taccetanaprayuktamapi dṛśyate, tathāpi tatprayuktatvaṃ hetoraprayojakaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1000: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1002: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1004: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1010: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1014: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1016: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1017: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1028: yadi tāvatparimitatvamiyattā, sā nabhaso 'pi nāstītyavyāpako hetuḥ parimāṇāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1029: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1031: nahi kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpi, kintu kāraṇaṃ kāryavyāpīti parimitaṃ nabhastanmātrādyavyāpitvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1032: hanta sattvarajastamāṃsyapi na parasparaṃ vyāpnuvanti, naca tattvāntarapūrvakatvameteṣāmiti vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1033: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti, mithaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1035: nahi citiśaṅktiḥ kūṭasthanityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate, tataśca tadavyāpakā guṇā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1037: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1042: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ, tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1043: balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam, evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ, sāpi cetanādhiṣṭhānameva gamayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1047: pravṛtteśca'ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1053: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha--satyametat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1057: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1061: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1064: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:1066: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1067: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo
GSP33brsvbh2u:1069: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1070: pratipannāḥ, tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1071: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati--tadabhidhīyate--na brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1072: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1073: sādhanīyaḥ, kevalamasya pravṛtti prati kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1074_0: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1074_1: cetanahetukatvaṃ pravṛtterniścīyate, na tu cetanasadbhāvamātreṇa, yenātiprasaṅgo bhavet bhūtacaitanikānāmapi cedanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1077: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1078: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati--nanu taveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1082: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate, tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1084: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1086: yeṣāṃ tu cetanātiriktaṃ nāstyadvaitavādināṃ, teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1089: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā, tadāveśenāsya codyasyāsakṛtprayuktatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1092: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1100: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1101: tatrāpi cetanādhiṣṭhitatvaṃ sādhyaṃ, na ca sādhyenaiva vyabhicāraḥ, tathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1105: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1108: nanu 'upasaṃhāradarśanāt'ityatrānapekṣasya pravṛttirdaśitā, iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata
GSP33brsvbh2u:1110: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1113_0: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate, kintu pradhānameva
GSP33brsvbh2u:1113_1: svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1118_0: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta
GSP33brsvbh2u:1118_1: vaiṣamyeṇa vā, na tvayaṃ kādācitkaḥ pariṇāmabheda upapadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1119: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1122: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate, upayogamātre tadapekṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1123: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1124: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate, uta cetanam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1125: na tāvannimittāntaraṃ, dhenudehasthasyaudaryasya vahnyādibhedasya nimittāntarasya saṃbhavāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1126: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1134: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na
GSP33brsvbh2u:1136: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ, bhogena caitatpravartitamiti tameva kuryānna mokṣaṃ, tenāpravartitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1138: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1140: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1146: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1148: kṛtabhogamapi pradhānamāsattvapuruṣānyatākhyāteḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇa bhojayatīti cet, atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1152: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1159: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1161: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1162: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1163: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1167: mā bhūtpuruṣārthasya śaktyarthavattvasya vā pravartakatvam, puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1175: yadi pradhānāvasthā kūṭasthanityā, tato na tasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1177: yathāhuḥ--'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1183: yatsāmyāvasthayā suciraṃ paryaṇamatkathaṃ tadevāsati vilakṣaṇapratyayopanipāte vaiṣamyamupaiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1184: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1188: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1195: karmendriyāṇi pañca, saptamaṃ ca mana iti saptendriyāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1202: nahi tapirastiriva kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ, kintu paciriva karmasthabhāvakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1204: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1207: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1210: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1211: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1215: sannarthinaṃ dunoti, tadartho tapyastāpakaścārthaḥ, tau cemau loke
GSP33brsvbh2u:1221: dṛgdarśanaśaktyoḥ kila saṃyogastāpanidānaṃ, tasya heturavivekadarśanasaṃskāro 'vidyā, sā ca vivekakhyātyā vidyayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1226: atra ca na sākṣātpuruṣasyāpariṇāmino bandhamokṣau, kintu buddhisattvasyaiva citicchāyāpattyā labdhacaitanyasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1230: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yodheṣu vartamānaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1231: prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate, evaṃ bandhamokṣau buddhisatve vartamānau kathañcitpuruṣe 'padiśyete, sa hyavibhāgāpatyā tatphalasya bhokteti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1237: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika ityasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1238: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmityasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1239: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:1241: kevalamanena sattvaṃ tapyam, abhyupeyaṃ tāpakaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1242: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1248: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1252: kevalamiyaṃ buddhisattvasya tāpakarajojanitā, tasya ca buddhisatvasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:1254: ityabhimānaḥ, na tu puruṣo viparyāsatuṣeṇāpi yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1255: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1257: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1260: malinatāmupaiti, na ca tadvastuto malinaṃ, naca bimbātpratibimbaṃ vastuto
GSP33brsvbh2u:1261: bhidyate, atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate
GSP33brsvbh2u:1262: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1263: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1264: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1268: nirmṛṣṭanikhilasavāsanakleśajālaḥ kevalaḥ svastho bhavati, na cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1278: kāraṇaguṇakrameṇa hi kārye guṇārambho dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā śuklaistantubhirārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ śuklaḥ, na jātvasau kṛṣṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1286: tatra ca prathamaṃ tāvadadṛṣṭavatkṣetrajñasaṃyogātparamāṇau karma, tato
GSP33brsvbh2u:1288: bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante, paramāṇutve sati bahutvāt, ghaṭopagṛhītaparamāṇuvat
GSP33brsvbh2u:1289: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta, teṣāmanārabdhatvāt, ghaṭasyaiva tu tairārabdhatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1290: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1293: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam, api tu dvāveva paramāṇū dyvaṇukamārabhete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1296: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1301_0: tasmāttenāpi tatkāraṇadvyaṇukavadaṇunaiva bhavitavyaṃ, tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:1301_1: bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa
GSP33brsvbh2u:1303: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇuṇaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam
GSP33brsvbh2u:1306: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1307: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva guṇāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate, vyabhicārādityāha--
GSP33brsvbh2u:1310: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate, na tu mahattvaguṇopajanane dvyaṇukagataṃ mahattvamapekṣate, tasya hṛsvatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1311: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate, na tu tadgataṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1314: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1317: na dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamapi pāramāṇuvarti pārimāṇḍalyamārabhate, tasya hi
GSP33brsvbh2u:1320: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1322: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1326: tadevaṃ yojanīyam--dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1327: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1328: athāvyavasthitā tathāpi tadavastho vyabhicāra ityāha--yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇava iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1329: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1333: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusaraṇe khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1334: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1351: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1352: athavā yadyaṇusamavāyyadṛṣṭamathavā kṣetrajñasamavāyi, ubhayathāpi tasyācetanasya cetanānadhiṣṭhitasyāpravṛtteḥ karmabhāvo 'tastadabhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1355: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1365: nodanasaṃskārāvabhighātena samānayogakṣemau, gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1373: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1375: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1376: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1381: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1388: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha--nahi tatrāpi kiñcinniyatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1393: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1397: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau
GSP33brsvbh2u:1399: tasmādanena samavāyisaṃbandhinā satā samavāyinau ghaṭanīyau, tathā ca samavāyasya saṃbandhāntareṇa samavāyisaṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne 'navasthā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1400: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1402: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1403: tasmāt svabhāvādeva samavāyaḥ samavāyinorna saṃbandhāntareṇeti nānavastheti codayati--nanvihapratyayagrāhyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1408: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1409: yadyucyeta guṇaḥ saṃyogaḥ, naca dravyāsamaveto guṇo bhavati, na cāsya samavāyaṃ vinā samavetatvaṃ, tasmātsaṃyogasyāsti samavāya iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1411: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1414: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1417: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1418: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto
GSP33brsvbh2u:1421: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1422: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1424: yadyucyeta saṃbandhināvasau ghaṭayati nātmānamapi saṃbandhibhyāṃ, tat kimasāvasaṃbaddha eva saṃbandhibhyām, evaṃ cedatyantabhinno 'saṃbaddhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1427: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1436: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1437: bhavadbhirabhyupeyate, tasya cedrūpādimattvamabhyupeyeta paramāṇutvanityatvaviruddhe sthaulyānityatve prasajyeyātāṃ, so 'yaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1439: niyatā prāptirhi prasaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ, tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1441: paramāṇunityatvasādhanāni ca teṣāmupanyasya dūṣayati--yacca nityatve kāraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1446: tenānityamiti laukikena niṣedhenānyatra nityatvasadbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ, te cānye paramāṇava iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1449: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1452: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam, evaṃ sati dvyaṇukasyāpi nityatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1453: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyetatathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1457: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1461: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)tadvināśakāraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1463: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1466: tathāhi--mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1467: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1469: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenākāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1471: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1472: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna
GSP33brsvbh2u:1473: evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam, etasyā api vaināśikaprakriyāyā upariṣṭānnirākariṣyamāṇatvāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1475: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1476_0: pariṇataṃ, na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ, paramāṇūnāṃ bhavanmate tadabhāvena dravatvānupapatteḥ, tasmādyathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1476_1: paramāṇu dravyamagnisaṃyogātkāṭhinyamapahāya dravatvenā pariṇamate, naca kāṭhinyadravatve parimāṇoradhiricyete, evaṃ mṛdvā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1476_2: suvarṇaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ piṇḍivasthāmapahāya kulālahemakārādi vyāpārādghaṭarucakīdyavasthāmāpadyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:1481: tasmātsāmānyasya paramārthasato 'nirvācyā viśeṣāvasthāstadadhiṣṭhānā bhujaṅgādaya iva rajjvādyupādānāṃ upajanāpāyadharmāṇa iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1485: anubhūyate hi pṛthivī gandharūparasasparśātmikā sthūlā, āpo rasarūpasparśātmikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ, rūpasparśātmakaṃ tejaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1491: triguṇastu tato vahniḥ sa śabdasparśavān bhavet //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1492: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasamātraṃ samāviśat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1497: śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca viśeṣāstena te smṛtāḥ //5//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1500: tathā ca yathāyathā saṃhanyamānānāmupacayastathātathā saṃhatasya sthaulyaṃ, yathāyathāpacayastathātathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1503: astu tāvacchabdo vaiśeṣikaistasya pṛthivyādiguṇatvenānabhyupagamāditi catvāri bhūtāni catustridvyekaguṇānyudāhṛtavān
GSP33brsvbh2u:1509: yastu brūte na gandhādisaṃghātaḥ paramāṇurapi tu gandhādyāśrayo dravyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1511: bhavitumarhatyanyatvāditi, taṃ pratyāha-na cāntareṇāpi mūrtyupacayaṃ dravyasvarūpopacayamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1514: natāvat paramāṇavo rūpato gṛhyante kintu kāryadvārā, kāryaṃ ca na
GSP33brsvbh2u:1515: gandhādibhyo bhinnaṃ, yadā na tadādhāratayā gṛhyate 'pi tu tadātmakatayā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1516: tathā ca teṣāmupacaye tadupacitaṃ dṛṣṭamiti paramāṇubhirapi tatkāraṇairevaṃ bhavitavyaṃ, tathā cāparamāṇutvaṃ sthūlatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1525: saṃpratyutsūtraṃ bhāṣyakṛdvaiśeṣikatantraṃ dūṣayati-api ca vaiśeṣikā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1527: na hi yathā gavāśvamahiṣamātaṅgāḥ parasparānadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1528: nirūpyante, vanhyādyanadhīnotpattayo vā dhūmādayo yathā vanhyādyanadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā nirūpyante, evaṃ guṇādayo na
GSP33brsvbh2u:1529: dravyādyanadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ, api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1530: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1534: na tadadhīnotpādatāṃ tadadhīnatvamācakṣmahe kintu tadākāratāṃ, tathā ca na
GSP33brsvbh2u:1537: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyete tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete, yatheha kuṇḍe dadhi
GSP33brsvbh2u:1538: yathā vā gauraśva iti, na tathā guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ, teṣāṃ dravyakāratayākārāntarāyogena dravyādākāriṇo 'nyatvenākāritayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1543: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato
GSP33brsvbh2u:1545: pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ, tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1556: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1558: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1561: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1564: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1566: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:1569: api cāyutasiddhaśabdo 'pṛthagutpattau mukhyaḥ, sā ca bhavanmate na
GSP33brsvbh2u:1572: atha bhavatu kāraṇasya yutasiddhiḥ, kāryasya tvayutasiddhi kāraṇātirekeṇābhāvādityāśaṅkyānyathā dūṣayati--evamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1573: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1574: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1575: naca kāraṇasamavāyādananyā kāryasyotpattiriti śakyaṃ vaktum, evaṃ hi sati
GSP33brsvbh2u:1577: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1581: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1584: mā bhūdaprāptiḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ, prāptistvanayoḥ saṃyoga eva kasmānna
GSP33brsvbh2u:1590: naca tantupaṭayoḥ saṃbandhastathā, utpannamātrasyaiva paṭasya tantusaṃbandhāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1592: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1593: na cāprāptipūrvikaiva prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ, ātmākāśasaṃyoge nitye tadabhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1595_0: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1595_1: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1597: tasmādupapattyanubhavābhyāṃ na kāryasya kāraṇādanyatvam, api tu kāraṇasyaivāyamanirvācyaḥ pariṇāmabheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1598: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ, saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha--nāpi saṃyogasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1605: śrotriyaḥ, parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1618: kiñcānyat dvābhyāmaṇubhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sāvayavasya kāryasyadvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1619: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1621: nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1628: ye hi paricchinnāste sāvayavāḥ, yathā ghaṭādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1629: tathā ca paramāṇavaḥ, tasmātsāvayavā anityāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1633: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam--vastubhūtāpīti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1638_0: prathamānaścāśvaśaphākāratāṃ nīyamānaḥ puroḍāśatāmāpadyate, tatra piṇḍo naśyati puroḍāśaścotpadyate, nahi tatra piṇḍāvayavasaṃyogā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1638_1: vinaśyanti, api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1639: bhavanti, evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante, natu mitho vibhajyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1641: saṃyogāntarotpādamantareṇa ca suvarṇe drava upajāyate, evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1647: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1649: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1653: tadidaṃ dūṣaṇāya vaināśikamatamupanyasituṃ tatprakārabhedānāha--sa ca bahuprakāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1657: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1662: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1674: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1675: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1677: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1678: saṃjñāskandhaḥ savikalpapratyayaḥ saṃjñāsaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaḥ, yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1679: saṃskāraskandho rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ, upakleśāśca madamānādayaḥ, dharmādharmau ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1687: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1688: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpāriṇī viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1689: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1691_0: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ ca kāraṇasamavadhānaṃ cetanaprekṣādhīnamasatyāṃ cetanaprekṣāyāṃ na bhavitumutsahata iti kāryotpattiścetanaprekṣādhīnatvavyāptā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1691_1: vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva evāvatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1692: yadyucyeta addhā cetanādhīnaiva kāryotpattiḥ, asti tu cittaṃ cetanaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1693: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā prakāśayadacetanāni kāraṇānyadhiṣṭhāya kāryamabhinirvartayatīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1695: na khalu bāhyābhyantarasamudāyasiddhimantareṇa cittābhijvalanaṃ, tatastu tāmicchan duruttaramitaretarāśrayamāviśediti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1704: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1707: yadyucyate astyālayavijñānamahaṅkārāspadaṃ pūrvāparānusaṃdhātṛ, tadeva kāraṇānāṃ pratisaṃdhātṛ bhaviṣyatīti, tatrāha--āśayasyāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1708: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1716: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1728: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:1731: 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1732: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1733: sati tu bīje 'ṅkuro bhavati, yāvat puṣpe sati phalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1734: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1735: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1736: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1738: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:1742: hetuṃ hetuṃ pratyayante hetvantarāṇīti, teṣāmayamānānāṃ bhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1745: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino
GSP33brsvbh2u:1748: ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti, ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmaṃ karoti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1749: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1750: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1753: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:1754: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādīti avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārā ajaniṣyanta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1758: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1759: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1760: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1761: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ, bījādiṣviva satsvacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapyaṅkurādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1771: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ, so 'yamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1772: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1773: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1774: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1778: tatraiteṣveva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu yaikasaṃjñā, piṇḍasaṃjñā, nityasaṃjñā,
