GSP33brsvbh2u:2174_1: sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2175: tasmāt kalpanāṣoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvādghaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2184: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2186: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh2u:2190: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2192: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2193: taduktam--'na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2199: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2202: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopalabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2209: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ, yathā svapnamāyādipratyayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2210: tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2211: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2212: atrāntare sautrāntikaścodayati--kathaṃ punarasati bāhyer'the nīlamidaṃ pītamityādipratyayavaicitryamupapadyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2213: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2215: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2220: tatpravṛttivijñānajananaśaktirvāsanā, tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2225: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2226: sattve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2227: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2228: naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2229: api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:2230: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2232: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire, tānnirākaroti--vāsanāvaicitryādityāha
GSP33brsvbh2u:2235: tathāhi--bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2237: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati, pītajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2241: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2242: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2243: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2244: nanūktaṃ na kṣaṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ śaktibhedābhedau, bhinnānāmapi kṣaṇānāmekasāmarthyopalabdheḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2245: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2247: tasmāt kṣaṇabhede 'pi na sāmarthyabhedaḥ, saṃtānabhede tu sāmarthyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2250: yadi bhinnānāṃ saṃtānānāṃ naikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ, hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2253: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2254: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2255: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2256: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2265: sa hyupalambhābhāvādvādhyavasīyeta, satyapyupalambhe tasya bāhyāviṣayatvādvā, satyapi bāhyaviṣayatve bāhyārthabādhakapramāṇasadbhāvādvā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2268: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2271: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2276: idamatrākūtam--ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2277_0: tatredaṃ nānādigdeśavyāpitvalakṣaṇaṃ sthaulyaṃ yadyapi jñānākāratvenāvaraṇānāvaraṇalakṣaṇena viruddhadharmasaṃsargeṇa yujyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2281: na ca tāvat paramāṇvābhāsamekajñānam, ekasya nānātmatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2283: na ca yāvanta ākārāstāvantyeva jñānāni, tāvatāṃ jñānānāṃ mitho
GSP33brsvbh2u:2285: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam
GSP33brsvbh2u:2287: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ-'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2290: tasmādbhavatāpi jñānākāraṃ sthaulyaṃ samarthayamānenapramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbhavāsaṃbhavāvāstheyau tathā cedantāspadamaśakyaṃ jñānādbhinnaṃ bāhyamapahnotumiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2291: yacca jñānasya pratyarthaṃ vyavasthāyai viṣayasārūpyamāsthitaṃ, naitena viṣayo 'pahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2292: asatyarthe tatsārūpyasya tadvyavasthāyāścānupapatterityāha-na ca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyāditi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2293: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ so 'pi vikalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2294: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati, sāhityasya tadviruddhabhedavyāptatvādabhede tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2297: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upalambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2301: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena
GSP33brsvbh2u:2302: manujairupalabhyate, na caitāvatā ghaṭādirūpaṃ prabhātmakaṃ bhavati, kintu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2305: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2309: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2311: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛttaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2321: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2322_0: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca puruṣaḥ pratipādyate yaśca pratipādayati
GSP33brsvbh2u:2323: tatsarvaṃ vijñānasya svāṃśālambane 'nupapannamityāha--api ca dvayorvijñānayoḥ pūrvottarakālayoriti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2324: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2325: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2327: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2328: tadatiriktor'thaḥ, pācyā iva taṇḍulāḥ pākātiriktā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2332: ayamarthaḥ--svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2337: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2338: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2339: apica yathā pradīpo na dīpāntaramapekṣate, evaṃ jñānamapi na
GSP33brsvbh2u:2343_0: ayamarthaḥ--satyamapratyakṣasyopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati, na tūpalabdhāraṃ prati tatpratyakṣatvāyopalambhāntaraṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2343_1: prārthanīyam, apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau
GSP33brsvbh2u:2344_0: artho hi nilīnasvabhāvaḥ pramātāraṃ prati svapratyakṣatvāyāntaḥkaraṇavikārabhedamanubhavamapekṣate, anubhavastu jaḍo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2346: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'nubhava utpannaśca, na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣo bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2348_0: tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti, na tu chidā chidāntareṇa, nāpi chidaiva chetrī, kintu svata eva devadattādiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2348_1: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa, nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva
GSP33brsvbh2u:2349: devadettādiḥ, evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2350: pramāntareṇa, nāpi pramaiva pramātrī, kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2351: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2359: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:2363: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2366: syādetat yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha--svayaṃsiddhasya ca sākṣiṇo 'pratyākhyeyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2368: tathāhi--pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2377: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2380: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate--sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2383: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:2390: tvayāpi cāvaśyaṃ jāgratpratyayasyābādhitatvamāstheyaṃ, tena hi svapnapratyayo bādhito mithyetyavagamyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2391: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2393: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2394: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum
GSP33brsvbh2u:2401: saṃskārajatvātsmṛtiḥ, sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati
GSP33brsvbh2u:2404: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2422: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattvena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2431: tadetannirācikīrṣurāha--śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2433: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2435: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh2u:2437: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2441: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2443: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2445_0: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi, tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2445_1: pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni
GSP33brsvbh2u:2447: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet, kiṃ punaridaṃ vicārāsahatvaṃ vastu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2448: yattattvamabhimataṃ, kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate, atha vicārāsahatvena nistattvameva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2449: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham
GSP33brsvbh2u:2452: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum
GSP33brsvbh2u:2455: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2457: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2458: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2466: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti //32//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2479: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā-pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2489: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2495: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2497: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2503: tatra samyag jñānaṃ na mokṣasādhanaṃ, nahi jñānādvastusiddhiratiprasaṅgāditi viparyayo jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ karmocyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2504: ārhatadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2505: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2508: aghātāni karmāṇi, tadyathā vedanīyaṃ karma śuklapudgalavipākahetuḥ, taddhi bandho 'pi na niḥśreyasaparipanthi tattvajñānāvighātakatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2509: śuklapudgalārambhakavedanīyakarmānuguṇaṃ nāmikaṃ karma, taddhi śuklapudgalasyādyāvasthāṃ kalalabuddhudādimārabhate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2515: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastadvimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchatyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2517: tatrasarvatra cemaṃ saptabhaṅgīnayaṃ nāma nyāyamavatārayanti, syādasti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2518: syānnāsti, syādasti ca nāsti ca, syādavaktavyaḥ, syādasti cāvaktavyaśca,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2519: syānnāsti cāvaktavyaśca, syādasti ca nāsti cāvaktavyaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2524: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam--'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2525: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2528: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2529_0: tathāhi--yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit
GSP33brsvbh2u:2529_1: kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt, heyahānānupapatteśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2530: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2532: vibhajate--na hyekasmindharmaṇi paramārthasati paramārthasatāṃyugapatsattvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parasparaparihārasvarūpāṇāṃsamāveśaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2533: etaduktaṃ bhavati--satyaṃ yadasti vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpeṇāstyeva na nāsti, yathā pratyagātmā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2534: yattu kvacit kathañcit kadācit kenacidātmanāstītyucyate, yathā prapañcaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2535: tadvyavahārato na tu paramārthataḥ, tasya vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2536: na ca pratyayamātraṃ vāstavatvaṃ vyavasthāpayati, śuktimarumarīcikādiṣu rajatatoyāderapi vāstavatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:2537: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2538: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2539: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2541_0: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:2541_1: ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye sādhu samarthitaṃ tīrthakaratvamṛṣemeṇātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2542: nirdhāraṇasya caikāntasattve sarvatra nānekāntavāda ityāha--ya ete sapta padārthā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2549: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2553: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam, tathā ca na śarīraparimāṇatvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2554: tathā hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārtsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2558: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2570: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ |
GSP33brsvbh2u:2572: kiṃ cātmano nityatvābhyupagame āgacchatāmapagacchatāṃ cāvayavānāmiyattānirūpaṇena cātmajñānābhāvānnāpavarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2575: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2576: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2577: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2582: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2590: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2600: ekaśarīraparimāṇatā na dīpyā, kintvekaparimāṇatāmātramaṇurmahān veti vivekaḥ //36//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2607: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2614: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ tadvimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2615: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ--cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvamātraṃ na tūpādānatvamapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2628: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpyamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2629: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2630: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaviparyaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2635: ayamarthaḥ--yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet, taccotpannamapi nādhitiṣṭhet, tāvanmātreṇa prāṇināṃ duḥkhānutpādāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2636: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2637: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2638: tasmātsvatantro 'pīśvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2642: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2647: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2650: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2652: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha--svārthaprayukta eva ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2653: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2654: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata
GSP33brsvbh2u:2662: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca
GSP33brsvbh2u:2665: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2676: āgamo hi pravṛtti prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2690: rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2692: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īśvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2699_0: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābhedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve
GSP33brsvbh2u:2702: svarūpaparimāṇamapi yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2703: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2705: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2718: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2719: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti, tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2729: mā bhūdabhyupagamena doṣaḥ, prakārāntareṇa svayameva doṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2732: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2735: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt, siddhāntahāniśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2743: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2748: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2749: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2759: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate, siddhānte tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2761: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2762: tathāca viyato nityatvāttejaḥpramukha eva sargaḥ, tathāca na virodhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2766: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2770: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2771: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2773: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvighātāya, vihanyate cāsahāyatvaṃ śrutaṃ kalpitena sasahāyatvena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2778: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare tu dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2779: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2785: samavāyyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2787: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete, yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnām /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2788: na cākāśasya tādṛśo viśeṣa utpādānutpādayorasti, tasmānnotpadyata
GSP33brsvbh2u:2817_0: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ kṣīrakumbhaprakṣiptakatipayapayobinduvadbrahmaṇi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2817_1: tatkārye ca vijñāte nabho viditaṃ bhavatītyāha-api ca sarvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānamiti //5 //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2821: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:2823: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2824: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2827: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2828: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2836: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha-nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhāneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2838: sa ca śrutyantareṇa virodhinā bādhyate, jaghanyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2843: yadyekaṃ vākyamanekārtha na bhavatyekasya vyāpāradvayāsaṃbhavāt, hanta bhoḥ kathamekasya sraṣṭuranekavyāpāratvamaviruddhamityata āha-sraṣṭā tveko
GSP33brsvbh2u:2848: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha-nacāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2852: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2865: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2867: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2868: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati natvalpatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2870: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2872: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha-
GSP33brsvbh2u:2874: so 'yaṃ prayogaḥ-ākāśadikklāmanaḥparamāṇavo vikārāḥ, ātmanyatve sati vibhaktatvāt, ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādivaditi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2892: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2896: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2897: traikālyāvacchedena hyāgantukatvaṃ vyāptaṃ, tatpramātuḥ sadāvartamānādvyāvartamānamāgantukatvaṃ svavyāpyamādāya nivartata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2900: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata
GSP33brsvbh2u:2904: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2907: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūktaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2909: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2914: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2926: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2931: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ iti yuktam, adhītavedasya brahmajijñāsādhikārādarśanānupapatterata āha-viyatpavanayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2936: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2941: sadekasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma śrūyate tadasati bādhake nānyathayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2942: uktametadvikārāḥ sattvenānubhūtā api katipayakālakalātikrame vinaśyanto dṛśyanta ityanirvacanīyāstraikālyāvacchedāditi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2943: na cātmā tādṛśastasya śruteranubhāvādvā vartamānaikasvabhāvatvaina prasiddhestadidamāha-sanmātraṃ hi brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2944: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatsvabhāvādvicalati tadanirvacanīyaṃ nirvacanīyopādānaṃ yuktaṃ, na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2945: yathā rajjūpādānaḥ sarpo na tu sarpopādānā rajjuriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2950: pāramārthiko hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nādirnānavasthayā duṣyati. samāropastu vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2966: naca sākṣādbrahmajatvasaṃbhave tadvaṃśyatvena tajjatvaṃ paraṃparayāśrayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2968: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ paśuyāgavājapeyoraṅgāṅginornānātvāttatra sākṣādvājapeyāsaṃbandhe kleśena paraṃparāśrayaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2970: sākṣādeva brahmopādānatvopapatteḥ kārakavibhakterbalīyastvānurodhenobhayathopapadyamānāḥ śrutayaḥ kāṃsyabhojinyāyena niyamyanta iti yuktamiti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2972: yathā tasyāḥ śṛtamiti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparāmātrasāmyena na tu sarvathāṃ sāmyeneti sarvamavadātam
GSP33brsvbh2u:2978: annaśabdo 'yaṃ vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhiyavādau tadvikāre caudane pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2979: śrutiśca prakaraṇādbalīyasī, sā ca vākyaśeṣeṇopodbalitā 'yatra kvacana
GSP33brsvbh2u:2980: varṣati'ityetena tasmādabhyavahāryaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2982: nahi pṛthivyapi kṛṣṇā, lohitādirūpāyā api darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2983: tataśca śrutyantareṇa 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ'ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2988: āsīt'iti ca punaḥ śrutyanurodhācca vākyaśeṣasya cānyathāpyupapatterannaśabdo 'nnakāraṇe pṛthivyāmiti rāddhāntaḥ //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2992: idānīmākāśādibhūtādhiṣṭhātryo devatāḥ kiṃ svatantrā evottarottarabhūtasarge pravartanta uta parameśvarādhiṣṭhitāḥ paratantrā iti /

GSP33brsvbh2u:3377: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3378: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi buddhirupalabdhī bhavet, tatastasyā upalabdhṛtvamātmanyadhyavasyeta
GSP33brsvbh2u:3381_0: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ, tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda
GSP33brsvbh2u:3381_1: iti tanna bhavatītyāha-na caivaṃ sati karaṇāntarakalpanābuddherupalabdhṛtvābhāvāt tatkimidānīmakaraṇaṃ buddhirupalabdhāvātmā
GSP33brsvbh2u:3384: kartṛtvaṃ, nāpi buddheḥ karaṇatvaṃ, kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3386: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3389: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3390: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati, yena dharmādharmāpekṣayā jagadvaicitryamāpadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3391: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3392: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3393: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmapracayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3394: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābhyām /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3396: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:3399: jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ, tadasati pratibandhake na praśaṃsāparatayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3400: naca śrutisiddhasya kalpanīyatā, yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3401: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3402: yadyapyayamīśvaro vītarāgastathāpi pūrvapūrvajantukarmāpekṣaya jantūn dharmādharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ viṣamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3406: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena
GSP33brsvbh2u:3408: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtve karotyeva jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3409: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstrāvirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādiśruteḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3412: 'iti smṛteśceśvaratantrāṇāmeva jantūnāṃ kartṛtvaṃ, na tu svatantrāṇāmiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3414: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3415: na kevalamānarthakyaṃ viparītaṃ cāpadyeta ityāha-tathā vihitakāriṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3421: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke |
GSP33brsvbh2u:3428: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ'ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3429: na caitābhirbhedābhedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni'ityādeḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3431: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3433: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3435: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥ tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri duḥkhamanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3436: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3438: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3445: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3447: naca yatparāstadaupacārikaṃ yuktam, abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3448: tasmādvaite bhāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3450: naca mokṣasyānarthabahulatā, yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3451: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbitamapi
GSP33brsvbh2u:3452: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabhāva iti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3462: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pañca viṣayā iti saptadaśako rāśiḥ //47//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3469: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanopariṇāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3471: ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3475: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3479: yadi sūkṣmasthūladehādisaṃghāto 'vidyopadarśita ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmāsmīti samyagdarśanamabhimatam, addhā tadvantaṃ prati
GSP33brsvbh2u:3486: yo hyātmanaḥ ṣāṭkauśikāddehādupapattyāvyatirekaṃ veda, na tu samastabuddhyādisaṃghātavyatirekaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3488: samastabuddhyādivyatirekavedinastu karmabhoktṛtvābhimānarahitasya nādhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathāca na yatheṣṭaceṣṭā, abhimānavikalasya tasyā apyabhāvāditi //48//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3493: yeṣāṃ tu sāṃkhyānāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vā sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāṃ pāramārthikīmicchatāṃ bahava ātmānaḥ sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3494: tatra praśnapūrvakaṃ sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramaṃ tāvadāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3495: yādṛśastādṛśo guṇasaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tatkṛte sukhaduḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe
GSP33brsvbh2u:3496: naca karmanibandhanā vyavasthā, karmaṇaḥ prākṛtatvena prakṛteśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3499: ayamarthaḥ-na pradhānaṃ svavibhūtīkhyāpanāya pravartate, kintu puruṣārtham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3500: yaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prayatnena bhogāpavargau puruṣārthau sādhitau taṃ prati samāptādhikāratayā nivartate puruṣāntaraṃ tu pratyasamāptādhikāraṃ pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3501: evaṃ ca muktasaṃsārivyavasthopapatteḥ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāpi bhaviṣyatīti nirākaroti-nahīti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3502: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vibhutvāt pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamuṃ puruṣaṃ pratyanenārthaḥ sādhita ityetadeva nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3505: bhavatu sāṃkhyānāmavyavasthā, pradhānasamavāyādadṛṣṭasya, pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3506: kāṇādādīnāṃ tvātmasamavāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pratyātmamasādhāraṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca manasā sahātmanaḥ svasvāmibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho 'nādiradṛṣṭabhedānāmanāditvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3510: nahi tasya manasa ātmāntarairyaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāmināpi, ātmasaṃyogasya pratisaṃyogabhedena bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3514: bhede hi tatkalpanā tataśca bheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3516: bhāṣyakṛtā tu prauḍhavāditayā kāṇādān pratyapyadṛṣṭāniyamādityādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3524: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3533: śabdaikapramāṇasamadhigamyā hi mahābhūtotpattistasyā yatra śabdo nivartate tatra tatpramāṇabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3540: rāddhāntastu syādetadevaṃ yadi sargādau prāṇasadbhāvaśrutirananyathāsiddhā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3543: tatrādhikāripuruṣaḥ prajāpatirapranaṣṭa eva trailokyamātraṃ pralīnamatastadīyān prāṇānapekṣya sā śrutirupapannārthā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3544_0: tasmādbhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāya sarvavijñānapratijñopapattyarthasya cottarasya saṃdarbhasya gauṇatve tu pratijñātārthānuguṇyābhāvenānapekṣitārthatvaprasaṅgātprāṇā
GSP33brsvbh2u:3545: naca caityavandanādivatsarvathā prāṇānāmutpattyaśrutiḥ, kvacit khalveṣāmutpattyaśravaṇamutpattiśrutistu tatra tatra darśitā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3570_0: atha gauṇaṃ tathāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāmupakramopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā śrutyantaraprasiddheśca brahmakāryatvaprapañcārthameva
GSP33brsvbh2u:3579: tadyathā-ghrāṇarasanavākcakṣuḥ-śrotramanohastatvagiti, ta ete grahāḥ, eṣāṃ tu viṣayā atigrahāstvaṣṭāveva 'prāṇo vai grahaḥ so 'pānenātigraheṇa gṛhīto
GSP33brsvbh2u:3583: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāgiti sapta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3586: nava vai puruṣe prāṇāsta uktā nābhirdaśamīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3588: tadyathā-buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇādīni pañca karmendriyāṇyapi hastādīni pañca ātmaikādaśa, āpnotyadhiṣṭhānenetyātmā manaḥ sa ekādaśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3594: atra praśnapūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3600: ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotrādayaste prāṇā ityukte itareṣāmaśīrṣaṇyānāṃ hastādīnāmaprāṇatvaṃ gamyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3601: yathā dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte vāmena na paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3602_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi śrutivipratiṣedo yadyapi ca pūrvasaṃkhyāsu na parāsāṃ saṃkhyānāṃ niveśastathāpyavacchedakatvena
GSP33brsvbh2u:3602_1: bahvīnāṃ saṃkhyānāmasaṃbhavādekasyāṃ kalpyamānāyāṃ saptatvameva yuktaṃ prāthamyāllāghavācca, vṛttibhedamātravivakṣayā tvaṣṭatvādayo
GSP33brsvbh2u:3615: naca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3622: nahi jātu mūkādayaḥ satsvapi viharaṇādyavagatasadbhāveṣu pādādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacanādimanto bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3624: ekamapi cāntaḥkaraṇamanekakriyākāri bhaviṣyati, yathā pradīpa eko
GSP33brsvbh2u:3627: ekameva tvantaḥkaraṇaṃ mananānmana iti cābhimānādahaṅkāra iti cādhyavasāyādbuddhiriti cākhyāyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3630: tadevamekādaśānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ vyavasthānādekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutirāñjasī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3632: tatrāvayutyanuvādena saptāṣṭanavadaśasaṃkhyāśrutayo yathaikaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte iti trīn vṛṇīta ityetadānuguṇyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3633: dvādaśatrayodaśasaṃkhyāśrutī tu kathañcidvṛttibhedena bhedaṃ vivakṣitvopāsanādiparatayā netavye
GSP33brsvbh2u:3635: apica śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ yatsaptatvābhidhānaṃ tadapi caturṣvevavyavasthāpanīyam, pramāṇāntaravirodhāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:3636: na khalu dve cakṣuṣī, rūpopalabdhilakṣaṇasya kāryasyābhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3637: pihitaikacakṣuṣastu na tādṛśī rūpopalabdhirbhavati yādṛśī samagracakṣuṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3641: iyamaparā sūtradvayayojanā-saptaiva prāṇāḥ cakṣurghrāṇarasanavākśrotramanastvaca utkrāntimantaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3646: tasmātsarvaśabdasya prakṛtāpekṣatvātsaptaiva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇyādaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3656: tasmācchrutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti, kintu pradarśanārthaṃ saptatvasaṃkhyeti siddham //6//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3660: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3664_0: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet, hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena
GSP33brsvbh2u:3665: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3670_0: 'nāsadāsīt'ityadhikṛtya pravṛtte brahmasūkte nāsadāsīye sargātprāgānīditi prāṇavyāpāraśravaṇādasati ca vyāpārānupapatte prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3670_1: na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya bahuśrutivirodhe 'pi ca śrutyoretayorgatimapaśyataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3671: rāddhāntastu bahuśrutivirodhādevānīditi na prāṇavyāpārapratipādinī, kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3678: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ'iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3679: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā'iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3680: vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya svarūpamastu, śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3681: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3683: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3687: na ca tvagekasādhyaṃ, tathā sati sāmānyavṛttitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3688: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3689: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3690: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ, tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo
GSP33brsvbh2u:3692: tasmānna kriyā, nāpi vāyumātraṃ prāṇaḥ, kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3696: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3697: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3700_0: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibhiḥ sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3701: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve
GSP33brsvbh2u:3704: syādetaccakṣurādibhiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3710: ekādaśatvaṃ ca karaṇānāṃ vyākupyetāpi tu prāṇāntarāsaṃbhavi dehendriyavidhāraṇakāraṇaṃ prāṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3711: tacca śrutiprabandhena darśitaṃ na kevalaṃ śarīrendriyadhāraṇamasya kāryam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3719: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3725: yadyapi cātrābhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirneṣyate tathāpi vikṣepasaṃskāralakṣaṇā manovṛttirihāstyeveti sarvamavadātam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3730: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha-aṇuśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3733: yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3735: svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnetavyā iti //13//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3738: yaddhi yatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa tāvadutsargaḥ parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3745: apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3746: tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3747: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-nānāvidhāsu tāvacchrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3750: saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3751: tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3753: anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī tadvaśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3756: nahi yantā rathamadhitiṣṭhinnapi tatsādhyavijayāderbhoktāpi tu svāmyeva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3757: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvanmātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3759: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamayyo devatā arhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3760: tasmāt prāṇānāmadhiṣṭhātryo devatā iti siddham, śeṣamatirohitārtham //14//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3767: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya śreṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3776: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāṇāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma'iti śrutiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3777: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttaya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti iti prāptam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3778: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-mukhyāt prāṇāttattvāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tatra tatra bhedena vyapadeśāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:3785: yāpi ca prāṇarūpatāmindriyāṇāmabhidadhāti śrutiḥ, tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3786: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3789: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3791: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3792: naca mukhyatvānurodhenāvagatabhedayoraikyaṃ yuktaṃ, mā bhūdgaṅgādīnāṃ tīrādibhiraikyamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3793: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3794: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ, tathāca vāgādivatprāṇasyāpīndraliṅgatāsti naca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3800: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3804: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3813: vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi tāsāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3816_0: niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja ādyāstisro devatāḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3816_1: pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇadhāraṇakartrātmanānupraviśya buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa
GSP33brsvbh2u:3816_2: iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:3817: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3819: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma
GSP33brsvbh2u:3822: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3823: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3826: tasya tu kvacitsākṣādasaṃbhavātparamparāśrayaṇaṃ, sākṣātsaṃbhavaśca yogyatayā darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3831: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3833: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:3834: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3835: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya, tasya pradhānakriyāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyayogyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3836: nanvanyatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakarmaṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3843_0: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:3843_1: vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve bhinnakartṛkatvena ktvaḥ prayogo
GSP33brsvbh2u:3850: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bhāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3857: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3858: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3862: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī-yadi sarvameva iti //21//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3865: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3866: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
